00020 #include <unistd.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00028 class FileDebugCalcRoute {
00029 
00030 public:
00031    
00035    inline static void openFile();
00036 
00040    inline static void closeFile();
00041 
00050    inline static void writeCostToFile(char what,
00051                                       uint32 itemID,
00052                                       uint32 oldCost,
00053                                       uint32 cost,
00054                                       bool realCost,
00055                                       bool isDest,
00056                                       const char* freeText);

00064 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00065    static FILE* c_file;

00068 
00070 // Implementation of inlineds.
00072 
00073 inline void
00074 FileDebugCalcRoute::openFile()
00075 {
00076 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00077    static int curRouteNbr = 0;
00078    char filename[1024];
00079    sprintf(filename, "/tmp/route_%u_%d", getpid(), curRouteNbr++);   
00080    c_file = fopen(filename, "a");
00081 #endif
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 inline void
00086 FileDebugCalcRoute::closeFile()
00087 {
00088 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00089    if ( c_file != NULL ) {
00090       fflush(c_file);
00091       fclose(c_file);
00092       c_file = NULL;
00093    }
00094 #endif
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 inline void
00099 FileDebugCalcRoute::writeCostToFile(char what,
00100                                     uint32 itemID,
00101                                     uint32 oldCost,
00102                                     uint32 cost,
00103                                     bool realCost,
00104                                     bool isDest,
00105                                     const char* freeText)
00106 {
00107 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00108    if ( c_file != NULL ) {
00109       fprintf( c_file, "%c;%u;%u;%u;%u;%d;%s;%s\n",
00110                what, 0xffffffff, itemID, oldCost, cost, realCost,
00111                (isDest ? "dest" : "") , freeText);
00112    }
00113 #endif   
00114 }
00115 
00116 inline void
00117 FileDebugCalcRoute::writeComment(const char* comment)
00118 {
00119 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00120    if ( c_file != NULL ) {
00121       fprintf( c_file, "X;%s\n", comment);
00122    }
00123 #endif   
00124 }
00125 
00126 #endif
